item.title: 2018 - In the rearview mirror
item.description: 2018 was quite an eventful year in my life. This year went by even before I could realize it. Here are a few highlights of my life during 2018 Masters Finally, I graduated from the University of Paderborn with a Masters degree in Computer Science ðŸ˜Œ. Usually, it takes a normal human being ~2.5 years to complete it, but being the lazy sloth that I am, it took me 3. According to the German law, I can now prefix my name with an M.
